steps: Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
Navigate to the table where you want to format the text.
Select the text within the table that you want to format.
Click on the 'Table Tools' tab in the ribbon.
In the 'Table Styles' group, click on the 'Borders' button to add or modify table borders.
In the 'Table Styles' group, click on the 'Shading' button to add or modify table cell shading.
In the 'Table Styles' group, click on the 'Font' button to change the font style, size, or color of the text.
In the 'Table Styles' group, click on the 'Alignment' button to align the text within the table cells.
Repeat steps 3-8 for any other text within the table that you want to format.
Save the changes to the document.
